skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Wall of Wind
rune.description:
Enemies are Frozen for 1.5 seconds after being pulled in.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Enemies are Frozen after being pulled in.

Cyclone Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Desert Shroud
rune.description: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken by 50%.
rune.simpleDescription: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken.

skill.name: Serenity
skill.description:
Cooldown: 16 seconds

You are enveloped in a protective shield that absorbs all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 16 seconds

Become immune to all attacks and control effects for 3 seconds.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.

rune.name: Ascension
rune.description: Increase the duration of Serenity to 4 seconds.

skill.name: Breath of Heaven
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

A blast of divine energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 69735 - 91192 Life.

Heal amount is increased by 30% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Heal yourself and nearby allies.

rune.name: Infused with Light
rune.description: Gain 14 additional Spirit from Spirit generating attacks for 5 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.
rune.simpleDescription: Gain additional Spirit from Spirit generating attacks for a limited time.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Blinding Speed
rune.description:
Gain 40% increased chance to Dodge for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased chance to Dodge after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Mangle
rune.description: Increase damage to 255% weapon damage as Fire.
rune.simpleDescription:
Increase damage of Crippling Wave.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Fire.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.description: Reduce all cooldowns by 20%.
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Near Death Experience
skill.description:
When receiving fatal damage, you instead restore 35% Life and 35% Spirit and are immune to damage and control impairing effects for 2 seconds.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.flavor: "We do not see what has been done, we only see what remains to be done." —Mantra of the Monks of Ivgorod

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 3% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Missile Ward
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skill.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Disorient
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Cast a flash of light in an area, causing enemies to be disoriented for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Disorients enemies for a short time.

skill.name: Focused Mind
skill.description: A 40 yard aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress by 3%.
skill.simpleDescription: An aura that increases attack speed for you and the Enchantress.
